The actors in this movie are also very talented. Corbin Bernsen is one of the most famous actors in Hollywood, and he does a great job in this movie as the young man who starts seeing his father's ghost.
Glenn Morshower is another actor who does an excellent job in this movie as the young man who starts seeing his father's ghost.
Overall, "Afterlife" is a very interesting and entertaining movie. I would definitely recommend this movie to anyone who is interested in watching a good and entertaining movie like "Afterlife".
